ygData.subject: RE: New patch "features"
ygData.msgSnippet: Does anyone know WHY they thought to fix surfing? I liked surfing.. anyone think we have a chance in heck of getting it back?  Other things I have noticed..
ygData.messageBody:
Does anyone know WHY they thought to fix surfing? I liked surfing.. anyone
think we have a chance in heck of getting it back? Other things I have
noticed..

Better "3d" sound support I can actually hear which direction a creature is
coming from or where a battle is. At least on an SB live

now get two resist messages on lullaby.. effectiveness of the song is still
slightly questionable given the second resist is far too common even on low
level lizard warriors outside Caziac.

Less flicker on some zone graphics

That's all I saw last night in about 2 hours of play.

-----Original Message-----
From: sentto-160851-13404-firehawk=cloud9.net@...
[mailto:sentto-160851-13404-firehawk=cloud9.net@...]On
Behalf Of Jamie Furtner
Sent: Friday, January 21, 2000 1:39 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] New patch "features"


From: Jamie Furtner <jfurtner@...>

At 10:00 PM 2000-01-20 , you wrote:
>From: "Bill Mann" <dabard@...>
>
>Well, the Meditate skill is pretty sweet. Didn't even have to zone for it
>to work (read somewhere that we would have to zone for it to kick in the
>first time). Also noticed crocs (blue to me at 17) in Lake Rathe, and
heard
>of froglocks there too... generic ones that fight (and get the snot beat
out
>of them by) the resident DW gobbies. Also noticed this interesting
>tidbit... you can no longer consume vast amounts of alcohol. Once you get
>to your... uhm... "drunkenness limit", you now get a message saying "You
>could not possibly consume more alcohol or get any more intoxicated!".
>Also, you get skill increases even when drunk now (maybe it was the fact
>that I was using Elven Wine, but I was able to get my Tolerance skill from
2
>to 45 with 60 jugs of wine... seems to be speeded up a bit)
>Anyone else notice any other hidden things?

Yes, I did -- I no longer 'surf' the landscape when running and playing
Selo's. They've
added animations so we now run and play a lute/drumstick.

Quies Songwind

--
Quies Songwind <Lightbringers>
Bard of the 26th Song
Karana
